title: Help wanted: Charting the challenge of tight labor markets in advanced economies

title: Unpacking the mysteries of productivity
description: Leading economist Chad Syverson speculates about the ingredients in productivity’s secret sauce.
summary: In the McKinsey Global Institute’s podcast, Chad Syverson discusses productivity, emphasizing AI as a potential game changer. He highlights the productivity slowdown since the mid-2000s, its effects on GDP, and the importance of management practices.

title: The hard stuff: Navigating the physical realities of the energy transition
description: The energy transition is a physical transformation in its early stages. What challenges lie ahead?

title: Bias Busters: Next in line? A structured approach to succession planning
description: A good old-fashioned task force can help boards depersonalize the process of picking new leaders.
summary: Executives often succumb to biases in succession planning, leading to poor leadership transitions. A structured approach, including a task force and diverse input, can mitigate these biases and ensure effective leadership continuity, ultimately enhancing organizational performance and adaptability to future challenges.
